name: I Rolled a DICE, but... Where am I Going?
name_original: I Rolled a DICE, but... Where am I Going?
description:
"Butterflies always come back, and your garden is me" - Victor and Leo

Guide this dice to the objective, but it will walk the same amount as shown on the top, in the beginning it looks hard to predict a path through this ocean of unpredictability, but if you open your eyes, you'll notice a sea of dandelions.

How to play:

- Use WASD to walk

- Reach the objective (yellow glowing tile)

- The dice will walk the amount shown on top of it

- The enemies also will walk the same amount shown on top of them

- If your number is higher than the enemie when you both touch, you earn a card, otherwise you'll lose one life

- Click the cards to activate their effect

Game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

ART - @nakamavitor

PROGRAMMING - @tryus97

Music by: Die Ruhe vor dem Sturm von Sofamusik
